Vykos: Ah! I knew you would understand, Megatron! I will land there 
now and wait for you. Bring slaves to protect you if you want; I will 
keep them... say... entertained, yes. My own slave is there too, you 
know! See you then. Lord Vykos out.

He closed the channel and turned to Warghoul.

Warghoul: Coordinates logged in. ETA in 10 decacycles.

Lord Vykos, however, did not seem very pleased.

Vykos: This is not Megatron alone... He almost discarded me... I will 
remind him what a true Renegade Lord is like.

Warghoul shifted (just a little, considering his shapeless body) but 
said nothing. Just then Lord Vykos left the bridge and went away. He 
seemed to be boiling with anger, which was not quite a good thing...
